name: jepx_monthly_avg
query:
select date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m') as `month`,
	j.region_id,
	avg(j.spot_price) as avg_monthly_price
	from jepx_da_pivot j
	left join ref_periods p on p.id = j.period_id
    left join ref_regions r on r.id = j.region_id
	where j.date > current_date - interval 5 year
	and j.region_id in(3,6)
	group by date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m'), j.region_id
	order by date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m') asc

name: high/low 8 vs cons 8 by year
query:
WITH period_range AS (
    SELECT
        id AS start_period,
        id + 8 AS end_period,
        time_period
    FROM
        ref_periods
    WHERE
        id < 41
),
spot AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
    WHERE
        DATE > '2022-12-31' -- Changed date filter to 2022-12-31
        AND region_id = 3
),
daily_avg_prices AS (
    SELECT
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period,
        round(AVG(s.spot_price),2) AS average_spot_price_for_range
    FROM
        spot s
    JOIN
        period_range pr ON s.period_id BETWEEN pr.start_period AND pr.end_period
    GROUP BY
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period
),
ranked_daily_avg_prices AS (
    SELECT
        dap.DATE,
        dap.region_id,
        dap.start_period,
        dap.end_period,
        dap.time_period,
        dap.average_spot_price_for_range,
        RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY dap.DATE, dap.region_id
            ORDER BY dap.average_spot_price_for_range ASC
        ) AS rank_lowest_avg_price_daily,
        RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY dap.DATE, dap.region_id
            ORDER BY dap.average_spot_price_for_range DESC
        ) AS rank_highest_avg_price_daily
    FROM
        daily_avg_prices dap
),
daily_spread_8_cons AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        region_id,
        (MAX(CASE WHEN rank_highest_avg_price_daily = 1 THEN average_spot_price_for_range END) -
         MAX(CASE WHEN rank_lowest_avg_price_daily = 1 THEN average_spot_price_for_range END)) AS spread_value
    FROM
        ranked_daily_avg_prices
    GROUP BY
        DATE,
        region_id
),
daily_spot_ranks AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DATE, region_id ORDER BY spot_price ASC) AS rn_asc_spot,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DATE, region_id ORDER BY spot_price DESC) AS rn_desc_spot
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
    WHERE
        DATE > '2022-12-31' -- Changed date filter to 2022-12-31
        AND region_id = 3
),
daily_spread_8 AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        region_id,
        ROUND((AVG(CASE WHEN rn_desc_spot <= 8 THEN spot_price END) -
               AVG(CASE WHEN rn_asc_spot <= 8 THEN spot_price END)),2) AS spread_value
    FROM
        daily_spot_ranks
    GROUP BY
        DATE,
        region_id
)
-- Yearly average for spread_8_cons
SELECT
    DATE_FORMAT(ds.DATE, '%Y') AS date, -- Format to year only
    'spread_8_cons' AS metric,
    ROUND(AVG(ds.spread_value), 2) AS value
FROM
    daily_spread_8_cons ds
GROUP BY
    DATE_FORMAT(ds.DATE, '%Y') -- Group by year

UNION ALL

-- Yearly average for spread_8
SELECT
    DATE_FORMAT(ds.DATE, '%Y') AS date, -- Format to year only
    'spread_8' AS metric,
    ROUND(AVG(ds.spread_value), 2) AS value
FROM
    daily_spread_8 ds
GROUP BY
    DATE_FORMAT(ds.DATE, '%Y') -- Group by year
ORDER BY
    date DESC, metric;

name: high/low 8 vs cons 8 by month
query:
WITH period_range AS (
    SELECT
        id AS start_period,
        id + 8 AS end_period,
        time_period
    FROM
        ref_periods
    WHERE
        id < 41
),
spot AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
    WHERE
        DATE > '20221231' -- Changed date filter
        AND region_id = 3
),
daily_avg_prices AS (
    SELECT
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period,
        round(AVG(s.spot_price),2) AS average_spot_price_for_range
    FROM
        spot s
    JOIN
        period_range pr ON s.period_id BETWEEN pr.start_period AND pr.end_period
    GROUP BY
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period
),
ranked_daily_avg_prices AS (
    SELECT
        dap.DATE,
        dap.region_id,
        dap.start_period,
        dap.end_period,
        dap.time_period,
        dap.average_spot_price_for_range,
        RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY dap.DATE, dap.region_id
            ORDER BY dap.average_spot_price_for_range ASC
        ) AS rank_lowest_avg_price_daily,
        RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY dap.DATE, dap.region_id
            ORDER BY dap.average_spot_price_for_range DESC
        ) AS rank_highest_avg_price_daily
    FROM
        daily_avg_prices dap
),
daily_spread_8_cons AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        region_id,
        (MAX(CASE WHEN rank_highest_avg_price_daily = 1 THEN average_spot_price_for_range END) -
         MAX(CASE WHEN rank_lowest_avg_price_daily = 1 THEN average_spot_price_for_range END)) AS spread_value -- Calculate daily spread here
    FROM
        ranked_daily_avg_prices
    GROUP BY
        DATE,
        region_id
),
daily_spot_ranks AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DATE, region_id ORDER BY spot_price ASC) AS rn_asc_spot,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DATE, region_id ORDER BY spot_price DESC) AS rn_desc_spot
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
    WHERE
        DATE > '20221231' -- Changed date filter
        AND region_id = 3
),
daily_spread_8 AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        region_id,
        ROUND((AVG(CASE WHEN rn_desc_spot <= 8 THEN spot_price END) -
               AVG(CASE WHEN rn_asc_spot <= 8 THEN spot_price END)),2) AS spread_value -- Calculate daily spread here
    FROM
        daily_spot_ranks
    GROUP BY
        DATE,
        region_id
)
-- Monthly average for spread_8_cons
SELECT
    DATE_FORMAT(ds.DATE, '%Y-%m') AS date,
    'spread_8_cons' AS metric,
    ROUND(AVG(ds.spread_value), 2) AS value
FROM
    daily_spread_8_cons ds
GROUP BY
    DATE_FORMAT(ds.DATE, '%Y-%m')

UNION ALL

-- Monthly average for spread_8
SELECT
    DATE_FORMAT(ds.DATE, '%Y-%m') AS date,
    'spread_8' AS metric,
    ROUND(AVG(ds.spread_value), 2) AS value
FROM
    daily_spread_8 ds
GROUP BY
    DATE_FORMAT(ds.DATE, '%Y-%m')
ORDER BY
    date DESC, metric;

name: high/low 8 vs cons 8 by day
query:
WITH period_range AS (
    SELECT
        id AS start_period,
        id + 8 AS end_period,
        time_period
    FROM
        ref_periods
    WHERE
        id < 41
),
spot AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
    WHERE
        DATE > '2024-12-31'
        AND region_id = 3
),
daily_avg_prices AS (
    SELECT
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period,
        round(AVG(s.spot_price),2) AS average_spot_price_for_range
    FROM
        spot s
    JOIN
        period_range pr ON s.period_id BETWEEN pr.start_period AND pr.end_period
    GROUP BY
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period
),
ranked_daily_avg_prices AS (
    SELECT
        dap.DATE,
        dap.region_id,
        dap.start_period,
        dap.end_period,
        dap.time_period,
        dap.average_spot_price_for_range,
        RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY dap.DATE, dap.region_id
            ORDER BY dap.average_spot_price_for_range ASC
        ) AS rank_lowest_avg_price_daily,
        RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY dap.DATE, dap.region_id
            ORDER BY dap.average_spot_price_for_range DESC
        ) AS rank_highest_avg_price_daily
    FROM
        daily_avg_prices dap
),
daily_spread_8_cons AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        region_id,
        MAX(CASE WHEN rank_lowest_avg_price_daily = 1 THEN average_spot_price_for_range END) AS lowest_avg_price,
        MAX(CASE WHEN rank_highest_avg_price_daily = 1 THEN average_spot_price_for_range END) AS highest_avg_price
    FROM
        ranked_daily_avg_prices
    GROUP BY
        DATE,
        region_id
),
daily_spot_ranks AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DATE, region_id ORDER BY spot_price ASC) AS rn_asc_spot,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DATE, region_id ORDER BY spot_price DESC) AS rn_desc_spot
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
    WHERE
        DATE > '2024-12-31'
        AND region_id = 3
)
-- Select spread_8_cons from the first query logic
SELECT
    date_format(ds.DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
    'spread_8_cons' AS metric,
    (ds.highest_avg_price - ds.lowest_avg_price) AS value
FROM
    daily_spread_8_cons ds

UNION ALL

-- Select spread_8 from the second query logic
SELECT
    date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
    'spread_8' AS metric,
    ROUND((AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_desc_spot <= 8 THEN j.spot_price END) - AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_asc_spot <= 8 THEN j.spot_price END)),2) AS value
FROM
    daily_spot_ranks AS j
GROUP BY
    j.date
ORDER BY
    date DESC, metric;

name: cons 8 by day
query:
WITH period_range AS (
    SELECT
        id AS start_period,
        id + 8 AS end_period,
        time_period
    FROM
        ref_periods
    WHERE
        id < 41
),
spot AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
    WHERE
        DATE > '2024-12-31'
        AND region_id = 3
),
daily_avg_prices AS (
    SELECT
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period,
        round(AVG(s.spot_price),2) AS average_spot_price_for_range
    FROM
        spot s
    JOIN
        period_range pr ON s.period_id BETWEEN pr.start_period AND pr.end_period
    GROUP BY
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period
),
ranked_daily_avg_prices AS (
    SELECT
        dap.DATE,
        dap.region_id,
        dap.start_period,
        dap.end_period,
        dap.time_period,
        dap.average_spot_price_for_range,
        -- Calculate rank for lowest average price
        RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY dap.DATE, dap.region_id
            ORDER BY dap.average_spot_price_for_range ASC
        ) AS rank_lowest_avg_price_daily,
        -- Calculate rank for highest average price (to easily pick the highest)
        RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY dap.DATE, dap.region_id
            ORDER BY dap.average_spot_price_for_range DESC
        ) AS rank_highest_avg_price_daily
    FROM
        daily_avg_prices dap
),
daily_spread AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        region_id,
        -- Get the average price where the rank for the lowest price is 1
        MAX(CASE WHEN rank_lowest_avg_price_daily = 1 THEN average_spot_price_for_range END) AS lowest_avg_price,
        -- Get the average price where the rank for the highest price is 1
        MAX(CASE WHEN rank_highest_avg_price_daily = 1 THEN average_spot_price_for_range END) AS highest_avg_price
    FROM
        ranked_daily_avg_prices
    GROUP BY
        DATE,
        region_id
)
SELECT
    ds.DATE,
    'spread_8_cons' AS metric,
    (ds.highest_avg_price - ds.lowest_avg_price) AS value
FROM
    daily_spread ds
ORDER BY
    ds.DATE;

name: consecutive 8 periods by rank
query:
# Rolling 8 periods low to high
WITH period_range AS (
    SELECT
        id AS start_period,
        id + 8 AS end_period,
        time_period
    FROM
        ref_periods
    WHERE
        id < 41
),
spot AS (
    SELECT
        DATE,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
    WHERE
        DATE > '2024-12-31' -- Corrected date literal
        AND region_id = 3
),
daily_avg_prices AS (
    -- This CTE calculates the average spot price for each period_range per day
    SELECT
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period,
        round(AVG(s.spot_price),2) AS average_spot_price_for_range
    FROM
        spot s
    JOIN
        period_range pr ON s.period_id BETWEEN pr.start_period AND pr.end_period
    GROUP BY
        s.DATE,
        s.region_id,
        pr.start_period,
        pr.end_period,
        pr.time_period
),

ranked_daily_avg_prices  AS (SELECT
    dap.DATE,
    dap.region_id,
    dap.start_period,
    dap.end_period,
    dap.time_period,
    dap.average_spot_price_for_range,
    -- Add the rank column here
    RANK() OVER (
        PARTITION BY dap.DATE, dap.region_id -- Rank independently for each date and region
        ORDER BY dap.average_spot_price_for_range ASC -- Order by lowest average price (ascending)
    ) AS rank_lowest_avg_price_daily
FROM
    daily_avg_prices dap
ORDER BY
    #dap.DATE,
    #dap.region_id,
    rank_lowest_avg_price_daily

),-- Order by the new rank to see the lowest prices first
    
overall_rank AS (
	SELECT
	    rdap.start_period,
	    rdap.end_period,
	    rdap.time_period,
	    #SUM(rdap.rank_lowest_avg_price_daily) AS total_rank_sum,
	    RANK() OVER (
	        ORDER BY SUM(rdap.rank_lowest_avg_price_daily) ASC -- A lower sum of ranks means a better overall performance (lower average prices)
	    ) AS overall_rank
	FROM
	    ranked_daily_avg_prices rdap
	GROUP BY
	    rdap.start_period,
	    rdap.end_period,
	    rdap.time_period
	ORDER BY
	    overall_rank ASC -- Order by the overall rank to see the best performing periods first
)

#SELECT * FROM daily_avg_prices;
#SELECT * FROM ranked_daily_avg_prices;
#SELECT * FROM overall_rank;  
SELECT time_period, overall_rank FROM overall_rank order by time_period asc;

name: high/low 4-8 spreads
query:
# Transposed high low 4 and 8
SELECT 
    date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date,
    'avg_4_lowest_spot_price' AS metric,
    round(AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_asc_spot <= 4 THEN j.spot_price END),2) AS value
FROM (
    SELECT
        date,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price ASC) AS rn_asc_spot,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price DESC) AS rn_desc_spot
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
        WHERE DATE > 20221231
        AND region_id = 3
) AS j
GROUP BY j.date

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date,
    'avg_4_highest_spot_price' AS metric,
    round(AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_desc_spot <= 4 THEN j.spot_price END),2) AS value
FROM (
    SELECT
        date,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price ASC) AS rn_asc_spot,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price DESC) AS rn_desc_spot
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
        WHERE DATE > 20221231
        AND region_id = 3
) AS j
GROUP BY j.date

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date,
    'avg_8_lowest_spot_price' AS metric,
    round(AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_asc_spot <= 8 THEN j.spot_price END),2) AS value
FROM (
    SELECT
        date,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price ASC) AS rn_asc_spot,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price DESC) AS rn_desc_spot
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
        WHERE DATE > 20221231
        AND region_id = 3
) AS j
GROUP BY j.date

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date,
    'avg_8_highest_spot_price' AS metric,
    round(AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_desc_spot <= 8 THEN j.spot_price END),2) AS value
FROM (
    SELECT
        date,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price ASC) AS rn_asc_spot,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price DESC) AS rn_desc_spot
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
        WHERE DATE > 20221231
        AND region_id = 3
) AS j
GROUP BY j.date

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date,
    'spread_4' AS metric,
    ROUND((AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_desc_spot <= 4 THEN j.spot_price END) - AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_asc_spot <= 4 THEN j.spot_price END)),2) AS value
FROM (
    SELECT
        date,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price ASC) AS rn_asc_spot,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price DESC) AS rn_desc_spot
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
        WHERE DATE > 20221231
        AND region_id = 3
) AS j
GROUP BY j.date

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    date_format(j.date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date,
    'spread_8' AS metric,
    ROUND((AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_desc_spot <= 8 THEN j.spot_price END) - AVG(CASE WHEN j.rn_asc_spot <= 8 THEN j.spot_price END)),2) AS value
FROM (
    SELECT
        date,
        period_id,
        region_id,
        spot_price,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price ASC) AS rn_asc_spot,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY date, region_id ORDER BY spot_price DESC) AS rn_desc_spot
    FROM
        jepx_da_pivot
        WHERE DATE > 20221231
        AND region_id = 3
) AS j
GROUP BY j.date

ORDER BY date DESC, metric;

name: basic jepx 30min
query:
select concat(j.date, ' ', p.time_period) as date_time,
	#j.region_id,
    r.jp_name,
	j.spot_price
	from jepx_da_pivot j
	left join ref_periods p on p.id = j.period_id
    left join ref_regions r on r.id = j.region_id
	where j.date > CURRENT_DATE - interval 10 day
	group by j.date, j.period_id, j.region_id
	order by j.date desc

name: basic jepx daily
query:
select #concat(j.date, ' ', p.time_period) as date_time,
    j.date,
	r.jp_name,
	avg(j.spot_price)
	from jepx_da_pivot j
	left join ref_periods p on p.id = j.period_id
    left join ref_regions r on r.id = j.region_id
	where j.date > CURRENT_DATE - interval 365 day
	group by j.date, j.region_id
	order by j.date desc
